creator: shalinimchandra@gmail.com
text:
We have been facing problems in accessing our site and it happens sometimes.
The environment that we are using is Apache and Jboss to run a Spring and Hibernate Application. DB2 is the backend. 

What we have observed is that the application is performing portwise but suddenly the http requests start to pile up. and this causes the users to experince difficulties.

Can you suggest a solution?

creator: shalinimchandra@gmail.com
text: Re starting the servers solves the prob temporarily.

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
Your problem might or might not be a symptom of an apache bug.

But what you posted is a problem that should be raised in a support forum, such as the apache httpd users list.  That might lead to a solution, or to a meaningful bug report for apache or some other component of your toolchain.
